span.span: Encounter; Discard one of your in-play cards

div.span: Your opponent cannot use an Encounter on their next turn. On your next turn, play as if you did not use an Encounter this turn.
Opponent skips their next Encounter step or ends their Encounter step before you take damage.

g.text: Text and Concept Copyright (C) J Roberts 2025. All Rights Reserved

div.span: Make a Simple Attack. If the die showed a 1 or 2, add 1d4 to the damage.

g.text: Text and Concept Copyright (C) J Roberts 2025. All Rights Reserved

div.div: When this is discarded, discard any cards attached to it.

div.span: If there is a card attached to this, you cannot use this action. Select a card from your hand that has any 1 Need symbol. Pay any costs to play it then attach it to this. The attached card has its normal effects.

g.text: Text and Concept Copyright (C) J Roberts 2025. All Rights Reserved

div.span: If you skipped your last Encounter step, you may perform 1 Simple Parley and 2 Simple Attacks.

g.text: Text and Concept Copyright (C) J Roberts 2025. All Rights Reserved

div.div: You may use a 1d8 Parley Die

g.text: Text and Concept Copyright (C) J Roberts 2025. All Rights Reserved

div.span: Skip your next encounter step; Look at 2 random cards in Opponent's hand.

g.text: Text and Concept Copyright (C) J Roberts 2025. All Rights Reserved

span.span: Consume; Both players roll their Parley Dice

div.span: If you rolled higher, Opponent loses ðŸ’— equal to the difference.

g.text: Text and Concept Copyright (C) J Roberts 2025. All Rights Reserved

div.div: You get -1ðŸŽµ for each counter on this

Once per turn when your Opponent plays a card, you both roll 1d6+ðŸŽµ. If you roll higher, Negate the effects of Opponent's card and Discard it, then add a counter to this. If you roll equal or lower, Discard this.

g.text: Text and Concept Copyright (C) J Roberts 2025. All Rights Reserved

div.span: Make a simple attack. On opponent's next turn, if an Encounter would reduce your HP, first roll 1d6. If the roll was 3 or lower, HP is not reduced.

div.span: Negate all effects of your cards with Right-hand and Left-hand slots and get +2ðŸŽµ until the end of this turn.

div.span: Attach an in-play card to this. If there are any cards attached to this, you cannot use this action.
Detach a card attached to this. If it could not legally be played, discard it.

div.span: Search your deck for a Spell and pay its ðŸŒˆ cost to attach it to this card.

div.div: Cards attached to this have their usual effects but their Fills symbols are ignored.

div.span: Discard any card attached to this.
Attach a card from your hand to this that you could otherwise play, then pay all costs to play the card. You cannot use this action if a card is already attached to this.
